column4: 2015. josiah butso passed away on thursday
column7: at the age of 21. he is survived by his mother maria butso
column10: all of dallas as well as many family members and friends. josiah was born on december 12
column11: 1993 in democratic republic of the congo and move to dallas
column12: texas in 2006. josiah graduated with honors from hillcrest high school in 2012 where he was a member of the national honor society. he attended texas a&m university in college station before transferring to the university of texas in dallas
column13: where he was studying psychology. he was a gifted actor and singer who appeared in several productions at hillcrest high school
column14: including his portrayal of lumiere in the musical beauty and the beast. he was a member of preston hollow united methodist church. visitation will be held on sunday
column16: 2015 at 1:00 pm at preston hollow united methodist church
column19: tx 75230. funeral service will begin at 3:00 pm. interment will be held on monday
column21: 2015 at 11:00 am at forest lawn cemetery
